# pd-menu-item

## Usage

```html
<pd-menu-item text="myText">
    <pd-icon size="2" name="print"></pd-icon>
</pd-menu-item>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description        | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `text`   | `text`    | Text for this item | `string` | `''`    |


## Slots

| Slot | Description |
| ---- | ----------- |
|      | Icon        |
